title: Riddick 2013 CAM Xvid Mp3-MiLLENiIUM
description:
[color=red]Riddick 2013 CAM Xvid Mp3-MiLLENiUM[/color]


[color=red]General[/color]

Source...............: MAXp [THANKS]
Length...............: 1h 51mn
Size.................: 1.43 GiB
Total Bitrate........: 1 834 Kbps
IMDb Information.... : http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1411250/
Sample Included......: yes

[color=red]Audio Info[/color]

Codec................: Mp3
Bitrate..............: 128 Kbps
kHz/bit..............: 44.1 KHz
Channels.............: 2
Language.............: ENGLISH
Subtitles............: no

[color=red]Video Info[/color]

Resolution...........: 720x368
Aspect Ratio.........: 1.957
Bitrate..............: 2 pass 1 694 Kbps
Framerate............: 29.970 fps




[color=red]Plot[/color]

Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. 
Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships:
one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.




[color=red][b]Notes[/b][/color]

Ok main objective to tone down the movement 
so we pulled and stretched the video here and there to rid most of it 
there is still the odd bit of movement you can see 
couldnt get rid of it all without chopping the vid into lots of pieces and rencodeing each piece 
which would take days (something my nymphomainiac wife wouldnt be to happy about)
so after pulling the perspective a tad here and there we added our filters 
adjusted contrast, brightness, saturation and hue then sharpend a tad 
also made a levels script to tone down the glares a touch 
audio was dam nice for cam just ran it threw a FLFR filter and normalised 
would be nice to see the 1080p..... thanks for the early source :)


dark in spots with some movement 

to qoute a buddy of mine ... 

"its a cam !!!" ;) 

enjoy .......... until better comes along
